22 bool ConnectedComponentsSearch::HasFoundMidLineComponents()
23 {
24  has_found_mid_line_components_ = (mid_line_components_.size() > 0);
25 
26  return has_found_mid_line_components_;

30 bool ConnectedComponentsSearch::HasFoundGroup()
31 {
32  for (auto& it: mid_line_cluster_groups_)
33  {
34  if(it.size() > 1)
35  {
36  has_found_mid_line_group_ = true;
37  return true;
38  }
39  }
40 
41  has_found_mid_line_group_ = false;
42  return false;
43 }

51 ConnectedComponentsSearchReturnInfo ConnectedComponentsSearch::FindConnectedComponents(Mat image)
52 {
53  SetImage(image);
54  ClearMemory();
55  ApplyConnectedComponents();
56  FilterMidLineComponents();
57 
58  if(HasFoundMidLineComponents())
59  {
60  GroupMidLineComponents();
61 
62  if(HasFoundGroup())
63  {
64  ComputeLengthAndDirectionOfConnectedMidLineComponents();
65  }
66  }
67 
68  return GetReturnInfo();
69 }

71 
72 void ConnectedComponentsSearch::FilterMidLineComponents()
73 {
74  Mat under_max_size_components_truth_table = components_stats_.col(COMPONENT_SIZE_COLUMN)<kMaxMidLineComponentSize_;
75  Mat over_min_size_components_truth_table = components_stats_.col(COMPONENT_SIZE_COLUMN)>kMinMidLineComponentSize_;
76 
77  Mat components_stats_float;
78  components_stats_.convertTo(components_stats_float, CV_32F);
79 
80 
81  Mat components_width = components_stats_float.col(ROI_WIDTH_COLUMN);
82  Mat components_height = components_stats_float.col(ROI_HEIGHT_COLUMN);
83  Mat components_volume = components_width.mul(components_height);
84 
85  Mat under_max_volume_components_truth_table = components_volume<kMaxMidLineComponentVolume_;
86  Mat over_min_volume_components_truth_table = components_volume>kMinMidLineComponentVolume_;
87 
88  Mat components_roi_x = components_stats_float.col(ROI_X_COLUMN);
89  Mat components_roi_y = components_stats_float.col(ROI_Y_COLUMN);
90 
91  Mat components_roi_width = components_stats_float.col(ROI_WIDTH_COLUMN);
92  Mat components_roi_height = components_stats_float.col(ROI_HEIGHT_COLUMN);
93 
94 
95  components_roi_width/=2;
96  components_roi_height/=2;
97 
98  components_roi_x += components_roi_width;
99  components_roi_y += components_roi_height;
100 
101  components_centroids_.convertTo(components_centroids_, CV_32F);
102 
103  Mat components_centroids_x = components_centroids_.col(CENTROIDS_X_COLUMN);
104  Mat components_centroids_y = components_centroids_.col(CENTROIDS_Y_COLUMN);
105 
106  Mat dx,dx2,dy,dy2,distance, distance2;
107 
108  subtract(components_roi_x, components_centroids_x, dx);
109  subtract(components_roi_y, components_centroids_y, dy);
110  pow(dx, 2, dx2);
111  pow(dy, 2, dy2);
112  add(dx2,dy2,distance2);
113  pow(distance2, 0.5, distance);
114 
115  Mat under_max_roi_center_to_centroid_distance_components_truth_table = distance < kMaxROICenterToCentroidDistance_;
116 
117  Mat descending_sorted_y_centroid_component_ids;
118  sortIdx(components_centroids_y, descending_sorted_y_centroid_component_ids, CV_SORT_EVERY_COLUMN + CV_SORT_DESCENDING);
119 
120  under_max_size_components_truth_table.convertTo(under_max_size_components_truth_table, CV_8UC1);
121  over_min_size_components_truth_table.convertTo(over_min_size_components_truth_table, CV_8UC1);
122  under_max_volume_components_truth_table.convertTo(under_max_volume_components_truth_table, CV_8UC1);
123  over_min_volume_components_truth_table.convertTo(over_min_volume_components_truth_table, CV_8UC1);
124  under_max_roi_center_to_centroid_distance_components_truth_table.convertTo(under_max_roi_center_to_centroid_distance_components_truth_table, CV_8UC1);
125 
126  for (int component_id = 0; component_id < components_count_; component_id++)
127  {
128  int id = descending_sorted_y_centroid_component_ids.at<int>(component_id,0);
129 
130  if (under_max_size_components_truth_table.at<uchar>(id, 0)&&
131  over_min_size_components_truth_table.at<uchar>(id, 0)&&
132  under_max_volume_components_truth_table.at<uchar>(id, 0)&&
133  over_min_volume_components_truth_table.at<uchar>(id, 0)&&
134  under_max_roi_center_to_centroid_distance_components_truth_table.at<uchar>(id, 0) )
135  {
136  int component_centroid_x = components_centroids_.at<float>(id,CENTROIDS_X_COLUMN);
137  int component_centroid_y = components_centroids_.at<float>(id,CENTROIDS_Y_COLUMN);
138  int component_roi_x = components_stats_.at<int>(id,ROI_X_COLUMN);
139  int component_roi_y = components_stats_.at<int>(id,ROI_Y_COLUMN);
140  int component_roi_width = components_stats_.at<int>(id,ROI_WIDTH_COLUMN);
141  int component_roi_height = components_stats_.at<int>(id,ROI_HEIGHT_COLUMN);
142  int component_size = components_stats_.at<int>(id,COMPONENT_SIZE_COLUMN);
143 
144  mid_line_components_.push_back(ConnectedComponent{component_centroid_x,
145  component_centroid_y,
146  component_roi_x,
147  component_roi_y,
148  component_roi_width,
149  component_roi_height,
150  component_size});
151 
152  cluster_centroids_.push_back(Point(component_centroid_x,component_centroid_y));
153 
154  }
155  }
156 }

158 
159 bool ConnectedComponentsSearch::IsPermuted(int i, int j, vector<string> &used_permutations)
160 {
161  if(i==j){ return true;}
162 
163  string permutation_hash12 = to_string(i) + to_string(j);
164 
165  auto it = find (used_permutations.begin(), used_permutations.end(), permutation_hash12);
166 
167  if (it != used_permutations.end())
168  {
169  return true;
170  }
171  else
172  {
173  string permutation_hash21 = std::to_string(j) + std::to_string(i);
174  used_permutations.push_back(permutation_hash12);
175  used_permutations.push_back(permutation_hash21);
176  return false;
177  }
178 }

182 
183 vector<pair<int,int>> ConnectedComponentsSearch::FindClusterConnections(vector<pair<int,int>> &cluster_connections)
184 {
185  for(int i=0; i<cluster_centroids_.size(); i++)
186  {
187  int clusters_ix = cluster_centroids_[i].x;
188  int clusters_iy = cluster_centroids_[i].y;
189 
190  for(int j=0; j<cluster_centroids_.size(); j++)
191  {
192  if(IsPermuted(i,j,used_permutations_)) continue;
193 
194  int clusters_jx = cluster_centroids_[j].x;
195  int clusters_jy = cluster_centroids_[j].y;
196 
197  float component_distance = sqrt(pow(clusters_jx-clusters_ix,2) + pow(clusters_jy-clusters_iy,2));
198 
199  if(component_distance > kMinMidLineComponentsDistance_ && component_distance < kMaxMidLineComponentsDistance_)
200  {
201  cluster_connections.push_back(make_pair(i,j));
202  }
203  }
204  }
205 }
206 
207 
208 double ConnectedComponentsSearch::Distance2d(const Point& lhs, const Point& rhs)
209 {
210  return sqrt(pow(lhs.x-rhs.x,2) + pow(lhs.y-rhs.y,2));
211 }
212 
213 void ConnectedComponentsSearch::GroupMidLineComponents()
214 {
215 
216  vector<pair<int,int>> cluster_connections;
217 
218  FindClusterConnections(cluster_connections);
219 
220  int num_vertices = cluster_centroids_.size();
221 
222  DepthFirstSearch ConnectedMidLineGroupFinder(num_vertices);
223 
224  for(auto it:cluster_connections){ ConnectedMidLineGroupFinder.addEdge(it.first, it.second); }
225 
226  vector<vector<int>> connected_mid_line_groups = ConnectedMidLineGroupFinder.connectedComponents();
227 
228  vector<Point> connected_cluster_centroids;
229 
230 
231 
232  for(int i=0; i<connected_mid_line_groups.size(); ++i)
233  {
234  for(int j=0; j<connected_mid_line_groups[i].size(); ++j)
235  {
236  connected_cluster_centroids.push_back(cluster_centroids_[connected_mid_line_groups[i][j]]);
237  }
238 
239  std::sort(begin(connected_cluster_centroids),
240  end(connected_cluster_centroids),
241  [&](const Point& lhs, const Point& rhs){ return Distance2d(kCarPosition_, lhs) < Distance2d(kCarPosition_, rhs); });
242 
243 
244  mid_line_cluster_groups_.push_back(connected_cluster_centroids);
245  connected_cluster_centroids.clear();
246  }
247 
248  used_permutations_.clear();
249 
250 }
251 
252 
253 void ConnectedComponentsSearch::ComputeLengthAndDirectionOfConnectedMidLineComponents()
254 {
255  for (auto& it: mid_line_cluster_groups_)
256  {
257  for(int i=0; i<it.size()-1; i++)
258  {
259  int x_bottom = it[i].x;
260  int y_bottom = it[i].y;
261  int x_top = it[i+1].x;
262  int y_top = it[i+1].y;
263 
264  int opposite = y_bottom - y_top;
265  int adjacent = x_top - x_bottom;
266 
267  int length = sqrt(pow(adjacent,2)+pow(opposite,2));
268  float angle = CalculateAngle4Quadrants(opposite, adjacent);
269 
270  connected_mid_line_clusters_length_and_direction_.push_back(LengthAndDirectionFromConnectedComponents{x_bottom,
271  y_bottom,
272  length,
273  angle});
274  }
275  grouped_connected_mid_line_clusters_length_and_direction_.push_back(connected_mid_line_clusters_length_and_direction_);
276  connected_mid_line_clusters_length_and_direction_.clear();
277  }
278 
279 }
280 
281 void ConnectedComponentsSearch::DrawGroupedMidLineComponentsDirections(Mat &rgb)
282 {
283 
284  std::vector<Vec3b> colors(mid_line_cluster_groups_.size());
285 
286  for (int label = 0; label < mid_line_cluster_groups_.size(); ++label)
287  {
288  colors[label] = Vec3b((rand() & 255), (rand() & 255), (rand() & 255));
289  }
290 
291  for(int i=0;i<grouped_connected_mid_line_clusters_length_and_direction_.size();i++ )
292  {
293  for (int j=0;j<grouped_connected_mid_line_clusters_length_and_direction_[i].size();j++ ) {
294 
295  int x_start = grouped_connected_mid_line_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].x;
296  int y_start = grouped_connected_mid_line_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].y;
297 
298  int length = grouped_connected_mid_line_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].length;
299  float angle = grouped_connected_mid_line_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].angle * PI/180;
300 
301  int x_offset = cos(angle) * length;
302  int y_offset = sin(angle) * length;
303 
304  int x_end = x_start + x_offset;
305  int y_end = y_start - y_offset;
306 
307  line( rgb,Point(x_start,y_start), Point(x_end,y_end), colors[i], 3, CV_AA);
308 
309  circle(rgb, Point(x_start,y_start), 7, Scalar(0,255,0),CV_FILLED);
310  circle(rgb, Point(x_end,y_end), 10, Scalar(0,0,255),2);
311  }
312  }
313 
314 
315 
316 }
317 
318 void ConnectedComponentsSearch::DrawGroupedMidLineComponents(Mat &rgb)
319 {
320  std::vector<Vec3b> colors(mid_line_cluster_groups_.size());
321 
322  for (int label = 0; label < mid_line_cluster_groups_.size(); ++label)
323  {
324  colors[label] = Vec3b((rand() & 255), (rand() & 255), (rand() & 255));
325  }
326 
327 
328  for (int i=0;i<mid_line_cluster_groups_.size();i++)
329  {
330  for (int j=0;j<mid_line_cluster_groups_[i].size();j++)
331  {
332 
333  int x = mid_line_cluster_groups_[i][j].x;
334  int y = mid_line_cluster_groups_[i][j].y;
335 
336 
337  circle(rgb, Point(x,y), 7, colors[i],CV_FILLED);
338  }
339  }

410 bool ConnectedComponentsSearch::IdAlreadyConnected(int id)
411 {
412 
413  for(auto it:grouped_mid_line_components_)
414  {
415  auto iter = find(it.begin(), it.end(), id);

423 void ConnectedComponentsSearch::GroupMidLineComponents()
424 {
425 
426 
427 
428  vector<int> linked_components = LinkInDistanceComponents();
429  vector<int> resolved_linkage_components;
430 
431  for(int i=0; i<mid_line_components_.size();i++)
432  {
433  int id = linked_components.at(i);
434 
435  if(IdAlreadyConnected(id)) continue;
436 
437  resolved_linkage_components.clear();
438 
439 
440  if(id!=kEndOfLinkageMarker_)
441  {
442  resolved_linkage_components.push_back(i);
443  resolved_linkage_components.push_back(id);
444  }
445 
446  while(id!=kEndOfLinkageMarker_)
447  {
448  id = linked_components.at(id);
449 
450  if(id!=kEndOfLinkageMarker_)
451  {
452  resolved_linkage_components.push_back(id);
453  }
454  }
455 
456  if(!resolved_linkage_components.empty())
457  {
458  grouped_mid_line_components_.push_back(resolved_linkage_components);
459  }
460 
461  }
